body_html:
Alright, I got it. I was looking for something too much complicated : a single hidden layer is enough for argmax.

I have soften argmax that way
V (a,b) C [-6,6]² , argmax(a,b) = 0,5× (tanh (-6,7×a+6,7×b−5))+0,5
That's what I am going to test.

Soften max is a bit harder but seem to be possible a similar way (with more hidden layers).

Soften max is a bit harder but seem to be possible a similar way (with more hidden layers).
body:
Alright, I got it. I was looking for something too much complicated : a single hidden layer is enough for argmax.

I have soften argmax that way
`V (a,b) C [-6,6]² ,  argmax(a,b) = 0,5× (tanh (-6,7×a+6,7×b−5))+0,5`
That's what I am going to test.

Soften max is a bit harder but seem to be possible a similar way (with more hidden layers).
